title: Ruby's
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, American, Beer/Wine, Take-out, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. A neighborhood cafe with Wi-Fi acess. Offers breakfast and coffee drinks, cocktails, burritos and sandwiches. Offers some vegetarian and vegan dishes - vegans could ask to substitute a cashew cheese for dairy. Vegan suitable dishes include falafel wrap (omit yogurt), garden salad with tofu, jerk tofu, tempeh reuben, veggie stack, and veggie burger (omit mayo). Sometimes the day's soup is vegan.
